We heave seating and heating, free filtered tap water, hot and cold drinks for sale (very reasonably priced), free books, games and puzzles for young people, free wifi, and accessible access and toilets. The space is free to use and everyone is welcome. We are open Mon-Fri from 8:30am to 7pm There is also an open office/remote work space that is available and free for all to use.

Hot meals and access to a children literacy programme attending the after school club at The Ark on Mondays and Fridays 3.30-5pm. Hot meals for young people and their parents 3.30-6.30pm on Fridays at Alan Pullinger Youth Centre, John Bradshaw Road, South, N14 6BN and Wednesdays at Ponders End Youth Centre, 129-139 South Street, Ponders End, EN3 4PX. Everyone welcome, no referrals needed.
